;This newspaper, Shanghai/Yancheng, Jiangsu, December 3rd  Xi Jinping, General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the State, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission During a recent inspection in Shanghai, it was emphasized that Shanghai must fully, accurately and comprehensively implement the new development concept, focus on promoting high-quality development, building a new development pattern, and focusing on the importance of building an international economic center, financial center, trade center, shipping center, and scientific and technological innovation center. The mission is to take scientific and technological innovation as the guide, reform and opening up as the driving force, national major strategies as the traction, and urban governance modernization as the guarantee. We must be brave in pioneering and active actions to accelerate the construction of a modern socialist international metropolis with world influence. Give full play to the role of leading and demonstrating in Chinese-style modernization.

;

;From November 28 to December 2, Xi Jinping, accompanied by Chen Jining, member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee, and Mayor Gong Zheng, visited financial institutions, science and technology innovation parks, and affordable leasing Conduct research on housing projects, etc.

;

;On the afternoon of the 28th, Xi Jinping went to the Shanghai Futures Exchange for inspection as soon as he got off the train. He combined the display of electronic screens and the delivery products of important listed products to listen to the exchange's introduction on how to enhance its global resource allocation capabilities, serve the real economy and national strategies, and understand the exchange's daily fund management, delivery and settlement and other matters. Xi Jinping emphasized that Shanghai's goal of building an international financial center is correct, the pace is steady, and the future is bright. The Shanghai Futures Exchange must speed up its efforts to build a world-class exchange and make greater contributions to exploring futures regulatory systems and business models with Chinese characteristics and building an international financial center.

;

;Xi Jinping then drove to Zhangjiang Science City in Pudong New Area and visited the Shanghai Science and Technology Innovation Achievements Exhibition. He used the video clip to understand the overall situation of scientific and technological innovation in Shanghai, walked into the exhibition hall to observe in detail the display of scientific and technological innovation achievements in basic research, artificial intelligence, biomedicine and other fields, and had cordial exchanges with representatives of scientific researchers. Xi Jinping pointed out that promoting Chinese-style modernization is inseparable from the strategic support of science and technology, education, and talents. Shanghai must be a good leader in this regard and accelerate its progress towards a scientific and technological innovation center with global influence. Efforts should be made to cultivate a large number of cutting-edge talents with a sense of mission and create good conditions for them to display their talents.

;

;In recent years, Shanghai has accelerated the construction of affordable rental housing, providing housing security for many new residents, young people and frontline workers in Shanghai. On the afternoon of the 29th, Xi Jinping visited the New Era City Builders Manager’s Home in Minhang District. After hearing the introduction of local efforts to increase the financing and construction of affordable rental housing and build a multi-level rental housing supply system of "one bed, one room, one suite", Xi Jinping fully affirmed. He successively walked into the houses of tenants of community residential and dormitory rental houses and shared spaces such as public kitchens and public laundry rooms, and carefully understood the living conditions of the city's frontline workers who lived here. The general secretary’s meticulous and ardent care moved everyone present. When leaving, community residents gathered around to bid farewell to the General Secretary. Xi Jinping said that he was very happy to see builders from all over the world living and working here. A city must not only have height, but also temperature. Our socialism is to take the path of common prosperity. Migrant workers come to Shanghai to contribute and are also the masters of the city. It is necessary to implement the people's city concept, continuously meet the diverse and diversified needs of the people for housing, and ensure that immigrants can come in, stay, live safely, and establish careers.

;

;On the morning of December 1, Xi Jinping listened to the work report of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee and Municipal Government and affirmed the achievements of various tasks in Shanghai.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that accelerating the construction of the "five centers" is an important mission assigned to Shanghai by the Party Central Committee. Shanghai should use this as its main direction to coordinate and guide all aspects of economic and social development, adhere to overall planning and coordinated advancement, make breakthroughs in key areas, and lead areas from point to point, so as to continue to improve the city's energy level and core competitiveness. We must take scientific and technological innovation as the guide, strengthen research on key core technologies, promote the transformation and upgrading of traditional industries, accelerate the cultivation of world-class high-end industrial clusters, accelerate the construction of a modern industrial system, and continuously enhance the status of the international economic center and the influence of global economic governance. It is necessary to strengthen the construction of modern financial institutions and financial infrastructure, implement high-level financial opening up to the outside world, and better serve the real economy, technological innovation and the joint construction of the "Belt and Road". It is necessary to deeply implement the free trade pilot zone improvement strategy and promote the upgrading of the international trade center. It is necessary to speed up the filling of shortcomings in high-end shipping services and improve the global allocation capabilities of shipping resources. It is necessary to promote the construction of high-level talent highlands and create a good innovation ecosystem. It is necessary to strengthen linkage with the Yangtze River Delta region and better exert its radiating and leading role.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that Shanghai, as the forefront of my country's reform and opening up and an international metropolis with deep links to the world, must comprehensively deepen reform and opening up from a higher starting point and enhance development momentum and competitiveness. It is necessary to vigorously promote pioneering reforms and leading opening-up in an all-round way, strengthen the integration of reform systems, solidly promote the comprehensive reform pilot in Pudong New Area, take the lead in carrying out stress tests in the Lingang New Area, and steadily expand institutional opening up such as rules, regulations, management, and standards. , deeply promote high-level opening up of cross-border service trade and investment, improve the level of manufacturing openness, further enhance the level of Hongqiao International Open Hub, continue to successfully host two-way open platforms such as the China International Import Expo, and accelerate the formation of an internationally competitive policy and institutional system . We must adhere to the "two unwavering principles", deepen the reform of state-owned assets and state-owned enterprises, implement policies and measures to ensure that private enterprises can participate fairly in market competition, create a world-class business environment, stimulate the vitality of various business entities, and enhance the attraction of high-end resources at home and abroad. .

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that we must fully implement the people's city concept, give full play to the party's leadership and the significant advantages of the socialist system, fully mobilize the enthusiasm, initiative and creativity of the people, and adhere to a blueprint in urban planning and execution. To the end, we will accelerate the digital transformation of cities, actively promote the comprehensive green transformation of economic and social development, comprehensively promote the construction of resilient and safe cities, and strive to find a new path for the modernization of megacity governance with Chinese characteristics. We should take improving people's livelihood and well-being as the starting point and goal of urban construction and governance, integrate the whole process of people's democracy into the modernization of urban governance, build an urban governance community in which everyone participates, everyone is responsible, everyone contributes, and everyone shares, and connects the people to serve the people. We must conscientiously solve the problems involving the vital interests of the people, adhere to and develop the "Maple Bridge Experience" in the new era, improve the grassroots governance system, and build a solid foundation for social harmony and stability.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized the need to implement socialist cultural thought with Chinese characteristics in the new era, deepen the reform of the cultural system, stimulate cultural innovation and creativity, and vigorously enhance cultural soft power. Persistently use the socialist thought with Chinese characteristics for a new era to focus on the soul, widely practice the core socialist values, consolidate the guiding position of Marxism in the ideological field, and further strengthen mainstream values, mainstream public opinion, and mainstream values ​​​​in the intersection and integration of various cultures. culture. We should pay attention to inheriting the city's cultural context, strengthen the protection of cultural relics and cultural heritage, inherit and carry forward red culture, thoroughly implement cultural projects that benefit the people, solidly promote the creation of mass spiritual civilization, deepen and expand the construction of new era civilized practice centers, promote the construction of a scholarly society, and comprehensively improve The civilized quality of citizens and the degree of urban civilization.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that adhering to the party’s leadership is the essential requirement and fundamental guarantee for Chinese-style modernization. Shanghai is the birthplace of our party. We must make good use of red resources such as the site of the National Congress, carry forward the great spirit of party building, educate and guide party members and cadres to keep in mind the "three musts", and pioneer and innovate, forge ahead and work hard on the new journey. It is necessary to implement the party's organizational line in the new era, implement the standards for good cadres in the new era, and build a team of high-quality professional cadres that matches the socialist modern international metropolis. It is necessary to grasp the characteristics of megacities, innovate ideas and models for grassroots party building work, and improve the party’s grassroots organizational system. We must resolutely oppose and punish corruption, promote a unified political environment that dares not, cannot, and does not want to corrupt, and maintain a clean and upright political ecology. The second batch of thematic education is coming to an end. It is necessary to insist on not lowering the standards and not letting up the momentum, integrating thematic education with all aspects of work, and ensuring that both sides are focused, both are correct, and both are promoted.

;

;On the morning of December 3, on his way back to Beijing, Xi Jinping, accompanied by Jiangsu Provincial Party Committee Secretary Nobunaga Hoshi and Governor Xu Kunlin, came to Yancheng City to visit the New Fourth Army Memorial Hall. In the exhibition hall, photos, historical materials, cultural relics, and simulated scenes completely display the glorious history of the New Fourth Army's rebirth and bloody battles. Xi Jinping stopped to observe and communicate with everyone from time to time. He emphasized that the history of the New Fourth Army fully demonstrates that the support of the people determines historical choices. The country is the people, and the people are the country. This is a vivid teaching material for carrying out revolutionary traditional education and patriotism education. We must make good use of this teaching material to educate and guide party members and cadres to inherit and carry forward the spirit of not being afraid of difficulties and dangers, having the courage to fight and dare to win, relying closely on the people, and strengthening the country. The great cause of construction and national rejuvenation continues to advance.

;

;Cai Qi, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee, accompanied the inspection.

;

;Li Ganjie, He Lifeng and responsible comrades from relevant departments of the central and state agencies accompanied them to participate in the above-mentioned relevant activities respectively. The responsible comrades of the Central Fifth Circuit Steering Group for Thematic Education attended the reporting meeting.

;General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important speeches during his recent inspection tours in Shanghai and Yancheng, Jiangsu Province inspired the cadres and the masses to strengthen their confidence and hesitation. Work hard and move forward bravely.

;

;Everyone said that in the new era and new journey, under the guidance of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, we must firmly grasp the primary task of high-quality development, fully, accurately and comprehensively implement the new development concept, and comprehensively Deepen reform and opening up, promote scientific and technological innovation, and comprehensively promote the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation with Chinese-style modernization.

;

;;Comprehensively deepen reform and opening up, enhance development momentum and competitiveness;

;

;“General Secretary Xi Jinping proposed that Shanghai should focus on building an international economic center, financial center, and trade center The important mission of Shanghai, a shipping center, and a science and technology innovation center is to comprehensively deepen reform and opening up from a higher starting point and accelerate the building of a modern socialist international metropolis, which points out the direction for Shanghai's next development." said Gu Jun, director of the Shanghai Municipal Development and Reform Commission. .

;

;He said that we will adhere to the "four priorities" in accordance with the requirements of the General Secretary, adhere to the implementation of national strategic tasks, focus on building Pudong's socialist modernization leading area and other task requirements, and better Vigorous reform, a higher level of opening up, and deeper innovation will continue to enhance the world influence of the "five centers".

;

;Reform and opening up are the source of vitality for development and progress. After studying General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important speech during his inspection in Shanghai, Wang Jinxia, ​​deputy director of the Shenzhen Qianhai Shenzhen-Hong Kong Modern Service Industry Cooperation Zone Administration, said: “As a pilot demonstration window for reform and opening up, we must give full play to our advantages at the forefront of reform and cross-border cooperation. Carry out innovative explorations in overseas investment and financing, cross-border trade, etc., promote opening up through reform, promote reform through opening up, and enhance the attraction of high-end resources at home and abroad."

;

;"The General Secretary proposed to Shanghai that 'we must comprehensively The requirement to vigorously promote pioneering reforms and leading opening-up has sent a clear signal." Chi Fulin, president of the China (Hainan) Reform and Development Institute, said that promoting reform and development through opening-up is the key to China's continuous progress in modernization. An important magic weapon for my country's achievements, comprehensively deepening reform and opening up remains a key decision that determines China's future prospects.

;

;“The General Secretary emphasized that the Shanghai Futures Exchange must accelerate the establishment of a world-class exchange. ;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping once again emphasized the need to adhere to the "two unwavering principles" during the inspection and proposed "implementing policies and measures to ensure that private enterprises can participate in market competition fairly", which made Xi'an Xidian Jietong Wireless Network Communications Co., Ltd. ;

;“A fair and orderly market environment, especially a technological innovation environment that protects intellectual property rights, is very important to private enterprises.” Cao Jun said, “This year, the two wireless LAN access control technologies led by the company Becoming an international standard, the General Secretary’s important speech makes us full of confidence in the future development path.”

;

;;Led by scientific and technological innovation to promote high-quality development;

;

;Walking into the artificial intelligence exhibition area of ​​the Shanghai Science and Technology Innovation Achievements Exhibition, a row of humanoid robots is quite eye-catching.

;

;Recalling the scene of reporting work to General Secretary Xi Jinping, Gu Jie, chairman of Shanghai Fourier Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd., said: "We will anchor innovation, continue to concentrate on solving problems in key core technologies, and strive to achieve today's Breakthroughs and leadership in the field of humanoid robots have contributed to the construction of a modern industrial system."

;

;"The General Secretary looked at the exhibits carefully, learned in detail about the latest scientific and technological achievements, and put forward ardent hopes for the scientists. We are very grateful. I'm excited." Luo Dajin, director of the Shanghai Municipal Science and Technology Commission, said that in the future, he will continue to strengthen basic research, continue to work on key core technologies, continue to promote the transformation of scientific and technological achievements, and accelerate the march towards a scientific and technological innovation center with global influence.

;

;In Anhui Hefei High-tech Zone, dozens of quantum companies gather on Yunfei Road, which is just a few hundred meters long.

;

;“We are deeply encouraged by the General Secretary’s great emphasis on scientific and technological innovation.” Guo Guoping, professor at the University of Science and Technology of China and chief scientist of Origin Quantum Computing Technology (Hefei) Co., Ltd., said that after years of hard work, , China stands at the forefront of international quantum computing research and will continue to increase scientific research and practical applications in the future.

;

;“The General Secretary’s inspection of the Shanghai Science and Technology Innovation Achievements Exhibition highlighted the core position of scientific and technological innovation in supporting and leading high-quality development and in the overall national development.” Deputy Director of the Beijing Municipal Science and Technology Commission and Zhongguancun Management Committee Zhang Yulei said that in the new era and new journey, we will follow the direction guided by General Secretary Xi Jinping, accelerate the construction of Zhongguancun's world-leading science and technology park, accelerate the cultivation of world-class high-end industrial clusters, serve high-quality development with scientific and technological innovation, and contribute to building a world science and technology power. and provide strong support for the realization of Chinese-style modernization.

;

;;Adhere to the people’s construction of the people’s city and improve the level of urban modernization governance;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping inspected affordable rental housing communities in Minhang District, Shanghai, conveying the message that the city Establish a clear people-centered orientation.

;

;

;

;"Living here I feel safe, dignified and comfortable, and I feel more motivated in my work and life! The general secretary cares about us so much, and the future will definitely be better." Qian Lili said.

;

;To improve the level of urban modernization governance, we need to adhere to a blueprint in urban planning and execution.

;

Behind the transformation of urban development logic is the concept of development. Progress across the board.

;;Inherit and carry forward red culture and vigorously enhance cultural soft power;

;

;

;

;"General Secretary Xi Jinping's important speech during his inspection in Shanghai pointed out the direction for the next step of comprehensively deepening reform and opening up, and building big cities." We should follow the road, lead demonstrations, and radiate and drive, better realize the city to make people's lives better, continue to improve the city's energy level and core competitiveness, and contribute to the great cause of building a strong country and national rejuvenation.

; ;

;Into the Wujin National High-tech Industrial Development Zone, Changzhou City, Jiangsu Province, Jiangsu Hengli Hydraulic Co., Ltd. high-pressure cylinder manufacturing On the base production line, different models of swing cylinders are passing factory tests one by one.

;

;In November this year, the three new swing cylinders developed by Hengli Company achieved mass production, which can add more than 100 million yuan in sales to the company every year and drive the upgrading and development of more than 400 companies in the industry chain. Promote the realization of independent, controllable, safe and reliable industrial and supply chains.

;

;On March 5 this year, General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out when participating in the deliberation of the Jiangsu delegation at the First Session of the 14th National People’s Congress: “We must insist on focusing our economic development on the real economy and deepen the promotion of new Industrialization, strengthening the re-engineering of industrial foundations and research on major technical equipment, and promoting the development of high-end, intelligent and green manufacturing industries."

;

;Jiangsu thoroughly implements the spirit of General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important speech, adheres to independent innovation on the path of exploring new industrialization, and demonstrates the new look, new results, and new achievements of scientific and technological self-reliance; it relies on new technologies to activate new momentum and expand New areas and new tracks.

;

;;Coordinated research on key technologies to enhance industrial resilience and safety levels;

;

;“The oil cylinder is regarded as the 'left and right arm' of engineering machinery. The swing cylinder can be used according to the It needs to achieve 0 degree to 360 degree swing, which can be used in the rotation of the working frame of aerial work vehicles, the positioning of drill arms of rock drilling equipment, the steering of tires or tracks of road equipment, etc.," said Li Dongming, assistant to the president of Hengli Company. These newly developed cylinders for domestic aerial work vehicles, mining equipment, mining boring machines, etc. will be sent to construction machinery manufacturers such as Xugong, Liugong, and Zoomlion after passing the test.

;

;Due to the technical difficulty, the market for swing cylinders was previously monopolized by foreign companies. "We cooperated with Chongqing University, East China Jiaotong University, etc., and worked with upstream suppliers to tackle key problems, and finally achieved a breakthrough in key technologies and owned 22 authorized patents." Tang Chengjian, head of new product development at the Hydraulic Technology Center of Hengli Company, said that the company has years of experience The production capacity of 20,000 sets of swing cylinders ensures independent control of the supply chain.
